title: @toMNI_Qwarpar
description: Transforms datasets to MNI space, then collectively re-transforms them to produce a refined average.

numcpu.title: Number of CPUs
numcpu.description: TOTAL NUMBER OF CPUS TO USE; should not exceed the number of CPUs (cores) on the system.

numjob.title: Number of Jobs
numjob.description: MAX NUMBER OF JOBS TO USE; often set to the same value as numcpu so that 1 dataset is processed in 1 core.
